fish.dust: %1$sThe day is over, and your fish bucket only could collect dust.
fish.no_rod: %1$sYou don't have any fish rod to fish with!

trash.overflow: %1$sYou found some trash while fishing, but your inventory was full, so we had to throw it back into the water...
trash.success: %1$sWhile calmly fishing, you found a floating %2$s, but it seems to be only trash :(

fish.overflow: %1$sYou found some fish, but part of your inventory was full, so we had to throw some of it back into the water...
fish.success: %1$sWhile calmly fishing, you found %2$s and you proceed to save them into your bucket.
fish.success_money: %1$sWhile calmly fishing, you found %2$s and **$%3$d credits** and you proceed to save them into your bucket.%4$s
fish.success_money_noitem: %1$sWhile calmly fishing, you found **$%2$d credits** and you proceed to save them into your pocket.
fish.rod_broke: %1$sYour fishing rod broke while trying to catch a fish :(
fish.waifu_help: Your waifu came and joined your fishing adventure and you both get a larger haul!

softban.no_permission: %1$sCannot soft ban: You don't have the Ban Members permission.
softban.no_permission_self: %1$sSorry! I don't have permission to ban members in this server.
softban.no_users: %1$sYou need to give me an user to soft-ban.
softban.hierarchy_conflict: %1$sYou cannot soft-ban an user in a higher hierarchy than you
softban.yourself_note: %1$sWhy are you trying to soft-ban yourself?
softban.self_hierarchy_conflict: %1$sCannot soft-ban member: %2$s, they are higher or the same hierarchy than I am!

ban.no_permission: %1$sYou can't ban: You need the `Ban Users` permission.
ban.no_users: %1$sYou need to give me an user to ban.
ban.no_permission_self: %1$sSorry! I don't have permission to ban members in this server.
ban.hierarchy_conflict: %1$sYou cannot ban an user who's higher than you in the server hierarchy! Nice try %2$s
ban.yourself_note: %1$sWhy are you trying to ban yourself, silly?
ban.self_hierarchy_conflict: %1$sCannot ban member: %2$s, they are higher or the same hierarchy than I am!
ban.unknown_error: %1$sHuh, I encountered an unknown error while banning %2$s

kick.no_permission: %1$sCannot kick: You have no Kick Members permission.
kick.no_users: %1$sYou need to give me an user to kick.
kick.no_permission_self: %1$sSorry! I don't have permission to kick members in this server.
kick.hierarchy_conflict: %1$sYou cannot kick an user in a higher hierarchy than you
kick.yourself_note: %1$sWhy are you trying to kick yourself, silly?
kick.self_hierarchy_conflict: %1$sCannot kick member: %2$s, they are higher or the same hierarchy than I am!

tempban.no_time: %1$sYou cannot temp ban an user without giving me the time.
tempban.no_reason: %2$sYou cannot temp ban someone without a reason.

music_usage.2: - To **queue songs from youtube or soundcloud** use `~>play` For example: `~>play https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aAolFWjGfMs` *It will connect automatically to the voice channel you are in*
music_usage.3: - To **search for a song on youtube** use `~>play <search term>` (without the leading < and >) For example: `~>play see you again` (You need to select the number, just *type the number* after the selection box pops up!)
music_usage.4: - To **search for a song on soundcloud** use `~>play soundcloud <search term>` For example `~>play soundcloud hot milk`
music_usage.5: - To **check the queue** you just type `~>queue`
music_usage.6: - To **remove a track from the queue** you just need to use `~>removetrack` It takes as an argument the position the song is queued at (you can check in on queue)
music_usage.8: - To **stop the music and unbind the player** use `~>stop`
music_usage.10: - And lastly, to **repeat a song** use `~>repeat` and to **repeat a queue** use `~>repeat queue`. Using `~>repeat` while repeat is on, turns it off
music_usage.11: For more info please use `~>help <command name>` (without the <> and replace command name with the name of the command you want)
music_usage.12: Enjoy your music and thanks for using Mantaro!

lang.info:
%1$sYou can change the server language (if applicable) using `~>opts language set <language code>`. Your personal language preferences can be changed using `~>profile lang <language code>`.
**Available languages:** `%2$s`
If your language is not here and you want to help, feel free to join the support server and join the translation effort!

music_general.no_song: %1$sYou need to tell me what song you want to play! *(YouTube, Soundcloud, Twitch URL or search queries are allowed)*
music_general.dj_only: %1$sYou need to be a DJ to use this command!
music_general.no_player: %1$sI cannot find any music player here...
music_general.not_connected: %1$sYou aren't connected to the voice channel I'm currently playing in! (If you believe this is an error, please report it on the support server)
music_general.track_error: %1$sOuch, something went wrong while playing this track! Sorry for the inconveniences, I'll try to play the next one available if there is one.
music_general.queue_finished:
%1$sFinished playing current queue! I hope you enjoyed it.
%2$s
music_general.soundcloud_no_args: %1$sYou need to give me the song name, I'm not a magician so I can't guess it :(

queue.nothing_playing:
Nothing here, just dust. Why don't you queue some songs?
If you think there are songs here but they don't appear, try using `~>queue 1`.
queue.nothing_playing_2: **If there is a song playing and you didn't add more songs, then there is actually just dust here. You can queue more songs as you desire!**
queue.page_overflow: Nothing here, just dust. Why don't you go back some pages?
queue.page_overflow_2: If you think there are songs here but they don't appear, try using `~>queue 1`.

connect.full_channel: %1$sI can't connect to that channel because it is full!
connect.non_existent_channel:
%1$sI received a non-existent channel as response. If you set a voice channel and then deleted it, that might be the cause.
 We reset your music channel for you, try to play the music again.
connect.missing_permissions_connect: %1$sI cannot connect to this channel due to the lack of permissions (%2$s).
connect.missing_permission_speak: %1$sI cannot speak in this channel due to the lack of permissions (%2$s).
connect.channel_locked: %1$sI can only play music on channel **%2$s**.
connect.already_connected: %1$sI'm already connected on channel **%2$s**! (Use the `move` command to move me to another channel)
connect.attempting_to_connect: %1$sI'm already trying to connect to channel **%2$s**! (Use the `move` command to move me to another channel)

listener.left_alone: %1$sI'll leave **%2$s** in 2 minutes because I was left all alone :(
listener.leave: %1$sI decided to leave **%2$s** because I was left all alone :(

loader.over_limit: %1$sThe queue you added had more than %2$d songs, so we added songs until this limit and ignored the rest.
loader.no_matches: %1$sThe search yielded no results. If this appears for *all songs* you try to search for, you might want to use`~>play soundcloud <search term>` instead on the meanwhile. Direct links to youtube should work too.
loader.over_queue_limit: %1$sCould not queue %2$s: Surpassed queue song limit (%3$s)!
loader.over_32_minutes: %1$sCould not queue %2$s: Track is longer than 32 minutes! (%3$s)
loader.fair_queue_limit_reached: %1$s**Surpassed fair queue level of %2$d (Too many songs which are exactly equal)**
loader.selection_text: Song selection. Type the song number to continue.
loader.timeout_text: This timeouts in 30 seconds. Type &cancel to cancel.

music_general.premium_beg: %1$sConsider donating on patreon.com/mantaro if you like me, even a small donation will help towards keeping the bot alive (Check `~>donate` for more info!)

forceskip.success: %1$sAn admin or Bot Commander decided to skip this song.

np.no_track: %1$sThere either isn't track playing or we cannot seem to find it, try playing a song

rewind.no_time: %1$sYou need to tell me how much you want to rewind the song. *(Example: `~>rewind 1m45s` will rewind the song 1 minute and 45 seconds)*
rewind.before_beginning: %1$sYou can't skip to before the beginning of a song

skipahead.no_time: %1$sYou need to tell me how much you want to skip ahead in the song. *(Example: `~>skipahead 1m45s` will skip 1 minutes and 45 seconds from where you are on the song)*
skipahead.past_duration: %1$sYou can't skip past the duration of a song

move.attempt: %1$sI will try to move to the channel you're in
move.cannot_connect: %1$sCannot connect: I either don't have permission to talk or to move channels.
move.non_existent_channel: %1$sI can't move to a non-existent channel!
move.vc_not_found: %1$sVoice channel not found or you didn't specify one!

clear.header: %1$sThe server DJ has decided to clear the queue!
clear.error: %1$sEither you're not connected to the VC or you're not the DJ.

shuffle.success: %1$sRandomized the order of the current queue.

vote.remove: %1$s**Your vote has been removed** You need %2$d more vote(s) to skip!

skip.no_track: %1$sThere seems to be no track to skip, so I cannot do anything...

removetrack.invalid_number_range: %1$s`%2$s` is not a valid number or range!

%1$sThe current volume for this session is: %2$d

%3$s
volume.no_args: %1$sYou need to tell me what volume you want me to set the music to (5 to 100).

custom.no_args: %1$sYou need to specify what you want to do with this command. Check command help for more info!
custom.error_running: %1$sError while running custom command... please check the response content and length (cannot be more than 2000 chars).
custom.not_loaded: The bot hasn't been fully booted up yet... custom commands will be available shortly!
custom.nsfw_enabled: %1$sThis command has been successfully marked as NSFW.
custom.nsfw_disabled: %1$sThis command has been successfully marked as SFW.
custom.nsfw_not_nsfw: %1$sThis command is marked as NSFW therefore it can only be used on NSFW channels.
custom.invalid: %1$sInvalid command selection. Check command help (`help custom`).

view.invalid: %1$sYou need to specify the command and the response number!
view.not_found: %1$sThere isn't a custom command with that name here.
view.less_than_specified: %1$sThis command has less responses than the number you specified...

raw.no_command: %1$sYou need to tell me what command you want to look at.

make.start_text:
%1$sStarted **"Creation of Custom Command `%2$s`"**!
Send `&~>stop` to stop creation **without saving**.
Send `&~>save` to stop creation an **save the new Command**. Send any text beginning with `&` to be added to the Command Responses. Use `~>nsfw` to mark this command as NSFW and `~>sfw` to revert.
This Interactive Operation ends without saving after 60 seconds of inactivity.
make.no_responses_added: %1$sNo responses were added. Stopping creation without saving...
make.no_name_specified: %1$sYou didn't specify the name of the custom command to create!

eval.error: %1$sThere was an error while evaluating your command!%2$s

import.not_found: %1$sThere are no custom commands matching your search query.
import.note: (You can only select custom commands from guilds that you are a member of)
import.success: Imported custom command `%1$s` from guild `%2$s` with a total of %1$d responses.

edit.invalid_number: %1$sYou need to specify a correct number to change.

custom.character_not_allowed: %1$sThis character isn't allowed on custom command names.
custom.no_cc: %1$sThere's no Custom Commands registered in this Guild, just a bit of dust.
custom.admin_only: This guild only accepts custom command creation, edits, imports and eval from administrators.
custom.not_found: %1$sThere's no Custom Command `%2$s` in this Guild.
custom.invalid_image: %1$sThis command contains an invalid image, please fix...
custom.invalid_string: %1$sThe string `{%2$s}` isn't valid, or the output is longer than 2000 characters.

mute.no_permissions: %1$sYou need to have either ban or kick members permission to mute.
mute.no_mute_role: %1$sThe mute role is not set in this server, you can set it by doing `~>opts muterole set <role>`
mute.null_mute_role: %1$sThe previously configured mute role on this server is now non-existent.
mute.no_users: %1$sYou need to give me an user to mute.
mute.no_manage_roles: %1$sI don't have permissions to administrate roles on this server.
mute.no_time: %1$sYou didn't specify any time. Remember that you need to add the `-time` argument and specify it there.
mute.time_not_specified: %1$sYou wanted time but didn't specify for how long.
mute.negative_time_notice: %1$sYou cannot mute someone for negative time. Unless you can bend space-time that is.
mute.default_time_too_long: %1$sThe default mute timeout length is too long (Maximum: 10 days)...
mute.time_too_long: %1$sThe specified mute timeout length is too long (Maximum: 10 days)...
mute.already_muted: %1$sThis user already has a mute role assigned. Please do `~>unmute` to un-mute them.
mute.self_hierarchy_error: %1$sI cannot assign the mute role to this user because they're in a higher hierarchy than me, or the role is in a higher hierarchy!
mute.user_hierarchy_error: %1$sI cannot assign the mute role to this user because they're in a higher hierarchy than me, or the role is in a higher hierarchy than you!

unmute.no_permissions: %1$sYou need to have either ban or kick members permission to un-mute!
unmute.no_mentions: %1$sYou need to mention at least one user to un-mute.
unmute.no_role_assigned: %1$sThis user doesn't have the mute role assigned to them.

love.no_mention: %1$sYou need to mention at least 1 user.
love.yourself_note: You're a special creature and you should love yourself more than anyone <3

loveletter.no_letter: %1$sYou have no love letters in your inventory, so you don't have anything to write your letter on.
loveletter.empty: %1$sYou cannot leave the love letter empty.
loveletter.no_marriage: %1$sYou aren't married, you cannot write a love letter for yourself...
loveletter.not_proposing_player: %1$sYou aren't the player who proposed this marriage!
loveletter.already_done: %1$sThis marriage already has a love letter assigned. Check it using `marry status`.
loveletter.too_long: %1$sThe love letter is too long (maximum is 500 characters)
loveletter.cannot_see: %1$sI cannot find the user that you're married to... Probably they aren't in any server with me.
loveletter.confirmation: %1$sAre you *sure* you want to write this letter for your marriage with **%2$s#%3$s**? This is PERMANENT while the marriage lasts. *Letter content:* %4$s
loveletter.confirmed: %1$sSuccessfully delivered the love letter to your loved one! Check it using `marry status`.
loveletter.scrapped: %1$sYou still have time to think on what to write, no need to rush!

status.no_marriage: %1$sYou aren't married, so I guess your status is uh... "not married"

marry.no_mention: %1$sMention the user you want to marry.
marry.marry_yourself_notice: %1$sYou cannot marry yourself, as much as you may want to.
marry.marry_bot_notice: %1$sYou cannot marry a bot. I don't think this is Futurama... yet. Wait, could bots and humans marry there?
marry.no_ring: %1$sYou cannot propose without two marriage rings! You can buy them by doing `~>market buy 2 ring` and then try proposing again <3
marry.confirmation:
%1$s%2$s, type with **yes** or **no** to the marriage proposal from %3$s
%4$sThis timeouts in 120 seconds.
marry.ring_check_fail: %1$sYou cannot marry with less than two rings on your inventory :(

divorce.not_married: %1$sYou aren't married with anyone, why don't you find that special someone?
divorce.success: %1$sNow you're single. That's nice I guess.

%1$s **Badge weight value:** %3$,d
%1$s **Experience weight value:** %4$,d
%1$s **Claim weight value:** %5$,d
%1$s **Reputation multiplier:** %6$.2fx

claim.no_user: %1$sYou didn't mention any user to claim.
claim.locked: %1$sYou're currently unable to perform this action.
claim.key_locked: %1$sThe user you tried to claim is key-locked and cannot be claimed.

claim.not_enough_slots: %1$sYou don't have enough slots available to claim this waifu. (Total slots: %2$s, Used slots: %3$s)

unclaim.no_user: %1$sYou need to mention a waifu to un-claim.
unclaim.confirmation:

%4$sThis times out in 1 minute.
unclaim.not_enough_money: %1$sYou don't have enough money to un-claim this waifu!
unclaim.player_locked: %1$sYou cannot do this at the moment.
unclaim.success: %1$sSuccessfully unclaimed **%2$s** with a cost of **%3$s credits**.

buyslot.locked: %1$sYou're currently unable to perform this action.
buyslot.not_enough_money: %1$sYou don't have enough money to buy more slots! You need %2$d credits.
buyslot.success: %1$sSuccessfully bought this slot for %2$s, you currently have %3s total slots and %4$s available slots.

waifu.description_header:
Here's a list with all of your beloved waifus, sorted by addition date.
*You can have a maximum of %1$d waifus as of now.*
waifu.no_waifu:
No waifus to see here, just dust :(
You can get waifus by claiming someone! Use `~>waifu claim` to get started.

coinflip.over_limit: %1$sHold in there! The limit is 1,000 coin flips
coinflip.no_repetitions: %1$sYou need to specify an Integer for the amount of repetitions
coinflip.success: %1$s Your result from **%2$d** time(s) yielded **%3$d** heads and **%4$d** tails

inventory.calculate: %1$s%2$s will get **%3$d credits** if all of the items are sold.

cast.no_item_found: %1$sI didn't find any item matching that.
cast.not_enough_money: %1$sYou don't have enough money to cast this. **(Cost: %2$s)**
cast.no_item: %1$sYou don't have the necessary item *%2$s* to proceed with this cast.
cast.not_enough_items: %1$sYou don't have enough of item *%2$s* to proceed. **(Needed: %3$s, Current: %4$s)**
cast.no_tool: %1$sYou need to have a %2$s to proceed with this cast!
cast.item_broke: Sadly, your wrench broke in the process, but you got your item!

dump.no_item: %1$sYou need to specify the amount of that item (if it's only one, you don't need to specify the amount) and the item that you want to dump.
dump.invalid: %1$sNot a valid number of items to dump.
dump.player_no_item: %1$sCannot dump an item you don't have!
dump.more_items_than_player: %1$sYou cannot dump more items than what you have.

price.non_existent: %1$sCannot check the price of a non-existent item.
price.no_price: %1$sThis item is not available neither for sell or buy (could be an exclusive collectible)
price.collectible: %1$sThis is a collectible item. (Sell value: %2$d credits)
price.success: %1$sThe market value of %2$s**%3$s** is %4$s credits to buy it and you can get %5$s credits if you sell it.

sell.no_item_amount: %1$sYou need to specify the amount of that item (if it's only one, you don't need to specify the amount) and the item that you want to sell.
sell.invalid: %1$sNot a valid number of items to sell.

all.confirmation: %1$sAre you *sure* you want to sell **all** of your items? Type *yes* to confirm and *no* to cancel
all.success: %1$sYou sold all your inventory items and gained %2$d credits!

sell.no_sell_price: %1$sYou cannot sell an item that cannot be sold.
sell.no_item_player: %1$sYou cannot sell an item you don't have.
sell.more_items_than_player: %1$sYou cannot sell more items than what you have.

buy.no_item_amount: %1$sYou need to specify the amount of that item (if it's only one, you don't need to specify the amount) and the item that you want to buy.
buy.invalid: %1$sNot a valid number of items to buy.
buy.no_buy_price: %1$sYou cannot buy an item that cannot be bought.
buy.item_limit_reached: %1$sYou cannot buy more of that object.
buy.success: %1$sBought %2$d %3$s for %4$d credits successfully. You now have %5$d credits.
buy.not_enough_money: %1$sYou don't have enough money to buy this item.

itemtransfer.bot_notice: %1$sYou cannot transfer items to a bot.
itemtransfer.locked_notice: %1$sYou cannot transfer items now. (Player is locked)
itemtransfer.overflow: %1$sThis player has the maximum possible amount of this item (5000).
itemtransfer.multiple_items_error: %1$sYou don't have any of these items in your inventory
itemtransfer.error: %1$sYou don't have enough of this item in your inventory to do this!
itemtransfer.no_item_mention: %1$sYou need to specify the person to transfer the item and the item to transfer.

transfer.bot_notice: %1$sYou cannot transfer money to a bot.
transfer.over_transfer_limit: %1$sYou cannot transfer this much money. (Limit: %2$d credits)
transfer.receipt_overflow_notice: Cannot send money to this player.
transfer.no_money_notice: %1$sYou cannot transfer money you don't have.
transfer.receipt_over_limit: %1$sThis user already has too much money...
transfer.item_transfer: %1$sYou cannot transfer items using transfer, use the `transferitems` command instead.
transfer.party: You can only transfer to the same person (%1$s) once every 4 minutes.

ls.desc: This is a list of all interactive items in Mantaro. For more info about interactive items check the wiki!

useitem.use_command: %1$sFor this item you need to use the command that's linked to the item! (mine for pick, fish for the fishing rod)
useitem.no_items_specified: %1$sYou need to specify what item to use.
useitem.interactive_no_action: %1$sThis item has been marked as interactive, but has no action set...
useitem.no_item: %1$sYou don't have this item in your inventory...

opts.note:
%1$sHey, if you're lost or want help on using opts, check <https://github.com/Mantaro/MantaroBot/wiki/Configuration> for a guide on how to use opts.
Note: Only administrators, people with Manage Server or people with the Bot Commander role can use this command!

list.header:
**Mantaro's Options List**
%1$s*All options must be prefixed with `~>opts` when running them*
%2$s

8ball.no_args: %1$sYou need to specify what you want the 8ball to answer.
8ball.error: %1$sI ran into an error while fetching the 8ball results.

list.name: Autorole name:
list.no_autoroles: There aren't any autoroles setup in this server.

iam.deleted_role: %1$sThe role that this autorole corresponded to has been deleted
iam.error: %1$sI couldn't take from you **%2$s. Make sure that I have permission to add roles and that my role is above **%2$s**
iam.no_role: %1$sThere isn't an autorole with the name `%2$s`.
iam.no_iam: %1$sYou need to specify which auto-assignable role you want to assign yourself!

iamnot.no_args: %1$sYou have to specify what role you want me to remove from you, silly.

misc.reverse_missing: %1$sYou didn't provide any message to reverse.

poll.missing:
%1$sYou didn't include either the %2$s argument or it was empty!
%3$s
poll.invalid:
%1$sThis poll cannot build. **Remember that the options must be a maximum of 9 and a minimum of 2 and the timeout must be a maximum of 45m and a minimum of 30s.**
Options are separated with a comma, for example `1,2,3`. For spaced stuff use quotation marks at the start and end of the sentence.
poll.other_poll_running: %1$sThere seems to be another poll running here...
poll.no_reaction_perms: %1$sSeems like I cannot add reactions here...
poll.too_long: This was too long to show, so I pasted it: %1$s
poll.success:
**Poll started. React to the number to vote.**
*%1$s*
Type &cancelpoll to cancel a running poll.
poll.error: %1$sAn unknown error has occurred while setting up a poll. Maybe try again? (internal error)
poll.result_screen: **Showing results for the poll started by %1$s** with name: *%2$s*

osustats.timeout: %1$sThe osu! api seems to be taking a nap. Maybe try again later?
osustats.error: %1$sUh-oh... seems like I just received scramble soup as a response... (Error while retrieving results)
osustats.error_detailed: Uh-oh... seems like I just received scramble soup as a response... (%1$s)

timezone.success: %1$sSaved timezone, your profile timezone is now: **%2$s**

description.no_argument:
%1$sYou need to provide an argument! (set or remove)
for example, ~>profile description set Hi there!
description.too_long: %1$sThe description is too long! `(Limit of 300 characters for everyone and 500 for premium users)`
description.success:
%1$sSet description to: **%2$s**
Check your shiny new profile with `~>profile`

displaybadge.not_specified: %1$sYou need to specify your main badge!
displaybadge.reset_success: %1$sNo badge will show on the top of your profile now!
displaybadge.important_success: %1$sYour display badge is now the most important one.
displaybadge.no_such_badge:
%1$sThere's no such badge...
Your available badges: %2$s
displaybadge.player_missing_badge:
%1$sYou don't have that badge.
Your available badges: %2$s

lang.nothing_specified: %1$sYou have to specify a language to use or `reset` to reset your language settings.
lang.success: %1$sMantaro will now talk to you in `%2$s`
lang.invalid: %1$sThat language doesn't exist! You can use `reset` to reset your language settings.

info.not_specified: %1$sYou need to specify a badge to see the info of.

badges.profile_notice: If you think you got a new badge and it doesn't appear here, please use `~>profile` and then run this command again.
badges.info_notice: Use `~>badges info <badge name>` to get more information about a badge.
badges.upvote_notice: **You can get a free badge for [up-voting Mantaro on discordbots.org](https://discordbots.org/bot/mantaro)!** (It might take some minutes to process)
badges.donate_notice: **You can get a badge for [supporting the development of Mantaro!](https://patreon.com/mantaro)!** (It might take some minutes to process)

rep.no_mentions:
%1$sYou need to mention or put the name of one user.
%2$s
rep.more_than_one: %1$sYou can only give reputation to one person

cooldown.waiting: **You'll be able to use this command again in %1$s**

birthday.no_guild_month_birthdays:
%1$sThere are no birthdays for this month (%2$s) here :(
%3$sIf you just setup the birthday announcer, please wait a bit until running this again. (Cache refreshes every 23h)
birthday.cache_not_running: %1$sThe Birthday cacher doesn't seem to be running (internal error) :(
birthday.error: %1$sSomething went wrong while getting birthdays (internal error) :(
birthday.invalid_date:
%1$sNot a valid date or it's not in the correct format.
Remember that the date format is `dd-mm-yyyy`
birthday.error_date:
%1$s%2$s is either not a valid date or I can't parse it properly. Please try with the correct formatting. Remember to include the year, although you can put any year and it won't affect anything.
Remember that the date format is `dd/mm/yyyy`
birthday.added_birthdate: %1$sSuccessfully added birth date. New birthday date: %2$s *(Format: dd-MM-yyyy)*
birthday.invalid_month: %1$sThat's not a valid month number! (Valid months are numbers from 1 to 12)
birthday.no_content: %1$sYou need to specify your birthday, `remove` to reset your birthday or `month` to check the birthday month list.

choose.nothing_to: %1$sYou need to tell me what to choose between. (example: `~>choose anime manga`)

remindme.nothing_specified: %1$sWhat could I remind you of if you don't give me what to remind you? Oh! Lemme remind you of setting a reminder!

cancel.select: Select the reminder you want to cancel.

remindme.no_time: You didn't give me a `-time` argument! (Example: `-time 1h`)

time.error: %1$sI found an error while looking for the timezone in the big book over there... or it could be invalid.

urban.no_args: %1$sYou need to tell me what term to look for in Urban Dictionary.
urban.too_many_args: %1$sToo many arguments! Page format is `name->page number`
urban.nsfw_notice: %1$sThis command can only be used in NSFW channels due to the nature of its results.

weather.no_content: %1$sYou need to specify which city and country to search the weather of!

check.key_valid_for: %1$sYour key is valid for %2$s more days :heart:
check.no_key_found: %1$sYou don't have a key enabled... If you're a premium from the old system you should still have your rewards, though!

activatekey.no_key_provided: %1$sI cannot enable a premium key if you don't give me one
activatekey.invalid_key: %1$sYou provided an invalid or already enabled key
activatekey.guild_already_premium: %1$sThis server already has a premium subscription

user.old_system: **Premium user under the old system! Don't worry tho, you're premium and your benefits will work properly!**

guild.old_system: **Premium guild under the old system! Don't worry tho, you're premium and your benefits will work properly!**

action.error_retrieving: %1$sI found an error while retrieving the next gif for this action... (external error)
action.permission_or_unexpected_error: %1$sS-Sorry! I dropped the image. (Probably I don't have permissions to send it)

lonely.pat: Aww, I see you are lonely, take a pat <3
lonely.hug: Aww, I see you are lonely, take a hug <3
lonely.kiss: Aww, I see you are lonely, *kisses*
lonely.poke: Aww, I see you are lonely, *pokes you*
lonely.slap: Hmm, why do you want this? Uh, I guess... *slaps you*
lonely.bloodsuck: J-Just how am I meant to? Oh well.. *sucks your blood*

self.kiss: *blushes*... I- uh... don't think you should be kissing a bot but...
self.lick: How does metal taste? I don't believe it's too great...
self.bloodsuck: Are you a vampire now?, oh!

game.not_enough_games: %1$sYou need to specify two games at least
game.invalid_selection: %1$sYou need to specify two games at least (Valid games: character, pokemon, number, trivia)!

multiple.invalid: %1$sYou need to specify the game and the number of times to run it
multiple.invalid_times: %1$sInvalid number of times. Remember that it must be an integer.
multiple.too_many_games: %1$sYou can only start a maximum of 10 games of the same type at a time.

trivia.wrong_diff: %1$sWrong difficulty specified! (Supported: easy, medium and hard)
trivia.fetch_error: %1$sError while starting trivia. Seemingly Open Trivia DB is having trouble.

number.start: %1$sGuess the number! **You have 5 attempts and 30 seconds. The number is between 0 and 150**
number.all_attempts_used: %1$sAlready used all attempts, ending game. The number was: %2$d
number.hint: Hint: The number is %1$s than your input number.

pokemon.footer: You have 5 attempts and 75 seconds. (Type end to end the game)

game.started_mp_role: %1$sStarted a multi-player lobby with all users with the specified role: **%2$s**
game.lobby_started:
%1$sStarted a new lobby! **Games: %2$s**
You can type `endlobby` to end all games and finish the lobby.
game.game_timeout_drop: %1$sSeems like I dropped a game here, but forgot to pick it up... I'll start your new game right up!
game.other_lobby_running: %1$sCannot start a new game lobby when there is a game currently running. (If this is an error, tell an admin to run `~>opts lobby reset`)

lobby.all_attempts_used: %1$sAlready used all attempts, ending game. Possible answers were: %2$s
lobby.incorrect_answer: %1$sThat's not it, you have %2$d attempts remaining.
lobby.won_game: %1$s**%2$s** just won $%3$d credits by answering correctly!

game.lobby_time_out: %1$sThe time ran out! The correct answer is: %2$s
game.end_footer: You have 5 attempts and 60 seconds. (Type end to end the game)
game.trivia_end_footer: You have %1$s attempts and 60 seconds. (Type end to end the game)
game.error: %1$sI found an error while setting up the game... (internal error)
game.character_load_error: %1$sReport this in the official server please. Failed to setup game for pre-saved character: %2$s

opencrate.no_crate: %1$sYou don't have any loot crate to open :(

prune.no_permissions: %1$sI cannot prune on this server since I don't have the Manage Messages permission.
prune.bot_no_messages: %1$sThere are no messages from bots or bot calls here.
prune.mention_no_messages: %1$sThere are no messages from users which you mentioned here.
prune.too_few_messages: %1$sToo few messages to prune. The minimum is 5.
prune.error_retrieving: %1$sI found an unknown error while retrieving the history to prune the messages (Internal: %2$s %3$s)
prune.not_valid: %1$sThat's not a valid number of messages to delete.
prune.less_than_five: %1$sYou need to provide at least 5 messages.
prune.messages_too_old: %1$sThere are no messages newer than 2 weeks old, discord won't let me delete them.
prune.lack_perms: %1$sLack of permission while pruning messages (No permission provided: %2$s)

imageboard.invalid_rating: %1$sYou provided an invalid rating (Available types: questionable, explicit, safe)
imageboard.nsfw_no_nsfw: %1$sI cannot send a NSFW image in a non-nsfw channel :(
imageboard.no_images: %1$sThere are no images matching your search criteria...
imageboard.no_results: %1$s**There aren't any more images or no results found**! Please try with a lower number or another search.
imageboard.error: %1$sThere was an error while looking for an image...
imageboard.blacklisted_tag: %1$sThis image tag has been blacklisted here by an administrator.
imageboard.error_tag: %1$sThere was an error while looking for this tag...
imageboard.error_random: %1$sThere was an error while looking for a random image...
imageboard.non_nsfw_channel:
%1$sNot on an NSFW channel. Cannot send lewd images.
**Reminder:** You can set this channel as NSFW by going to the channel settings and checking `Set this Channel as NSFW`.
imageboard.loli_content_disallow: %1$sSadly I cannot display images that allegedly contain `loli` or `shota` lewd/NSFW content because discord prohibits it. (Filter ran: Image contains a loli or shota tag and it's NSFW)
imageboard.null_list_notice: %1$sOops... something went wrong when searching... (If you used a tag, the tag might not exist)
imageboard.load_notice: If the image doesn't load, click the title.
imageboard.rule34_notice: If you don't like the content on this command, you can use ~>yandere
imageboard.yandere_nsfw_notice:
%1$sYande.re command can only be used in NSFW channels due to numerous reports of it sending explicit images which are marked as safe on their side.
You can try using `~>konachan` instead!

about.title: About Mantaro

description.1: Hello, I'm **Mantaro**! I'm here to make your life a little easier. To get started, type `~>help`!
description.3: **Moderation made easy** (`Mass kick/ban, prune commands, logs and more!`)
description.4: **Funny and useful commands**, see `~>help remindme` or `~>help hug` for examples.

credits.special_mentions: Thanks to bots.discord.pw, Carbonitex and discordbots.org for helping us with increasing the bot's visibility.
credits.thank_note: Much thanks to everyone above for helping make Mantaro better!

about.invite: Invite link: http://is.gd/mantaro (Commands this session: %1$,d | Current shard: %2$d)

description.2: **If you have any questions about the bot, feel free to join the support guild and ask**!.
description.3: We provided a patreon link in case you would like to help Mantaro keep running by donating [and getting perks by doing so!].
description.4: Thanks you for using the bot! **<3 from the developers and the Mantaro team**

invite.footer: We hope you have fun with the bot.

social.header: %1$sO-Oh, I see you're interested on seeing my social networks!
social.note: **If you like Mantaro, please up-vote on** <https://discordbots.org/bot/mantaro> **and/or consider donating on Patreon or Paypal! Thanks you~**

donate.beg:
%1$sOh hi! If you are interested in donating, please check the links below. Running Mantaro takes time and money, and every dollar is highly appreciated!

%2$s

help.title: Mantaro Help
help.base: Command list. For a detailed guide on the usage of Mantaro, please check the [wiki](https://github.com/Mantaro/MantaroBot/wiki).
help.support: If you have issues or inquiries while using Mantaro, please join the [support server](https://is.gd/mantaroguild)
help.patreon: [We need your help to keep Mantaro online! Click here for more info.](https://www.patreon.com/mantaro)
help.disabled_commands: Only showing non-disabled commands. Total disabled commands: %1$s
help.channel_specific_disabled_commands: Only showing non-disabled commands. Total channel-specific disabled commands: %1$s
help.footer: To check command usage, type %1$shelp <command> // -> Commands: %2$s

extended.no_help: %1$sThere's no extended help set for this command.
extended.not_found: %1$sA command with this name doesn't exist

anime.no_args: %1$sYou need to tell me what anime to look for.
anime.selection_start: Type the number of the anime you want to select.
anime.information_footer: Information provided by Anilist. Type &cancel to cancel.
anime.malformed_result: %1$sI got a wrong API result for this specific search. Maybe try with another search term?
anime.error:
%1$s**I swear I didn't drop your favorite anime!**
I received a ``%2$s`` while trying to process the command. (internal error)

character.no_args: %1$sYou need to tell me what character you want to look for.
character.selection_start: Type the number of the character you want to select.
character.error:
%1$s**I swear I didn't d-drop your waifu, please forgive me!**
I got ``%2$s`` while trying to process this command. (internal error)

daily.check: %1$sYou'll be able to claim your daily on: **%2$s.**

errors.bot: %1$sYou cannot transfer your daily to a bot.
errors.receipt_locked: That user cannot receive daily credits now.
errors.own_locked: You cannot receive your daily now.

streak.first_time: First time claiming daily, have fun! (Come back for your streak tomorrow!)
streak.lost_streak: 2+ days have passed since your last daily, so your streak of `%1$dx` got reset :(
streak.bonus: You won a bonus of $%1$s for claiming your daily for 5 days in a row or more! (Included on the money shown!)

given.up:
Streak up! Current streak: `%1$dx`.
*The streak was applied to your profile!*
given.bonus: %1$s won a bonus of $%2$s for claiming your daily for 5 days in a row or more! (Included on the money shown!)

gamble.no_credits: %1$sYou're broke. Maybe search for some credits first.
gamble.too_much_money: %1$sYou have too much money! Maybe transfer or buy items? Now you can also use `~>slots` for all your gambling needs! Thanks for not breaking the local bank. *(Gamble absolute limit: %2$d credits)*
gamble.invalid_money_or_modifier: %1$sPlease type a valid number less than or equal to your current balance or `all` to gamble all your credits.
gamble.not_enough_money: %1$sPlease type a value within your balance.
gamble.confirmation_message: %1$sYou're about to bet **%2$d** credits (which seems to be a lot). Are you sure? Type **yes** to continue and **no** otherwise.
gamble.win: %1$sCongrats, you won %2$d credits and got to keep what you had.
gamble.win_overflow: %1$sCongrats, you won %2$d credits. But you already had too many credits. Your bag overflowed.
gamble.too_much: %1$sYou can only gamble up to 275 million at once. You don't want to go full broke do you? *(Gamble single limit: %2$d credits)*
gamble.too_little: %1$sYou cannot gamble so little money (Minimum: 100 credits)

loot.item_overflow: But you already had too many items, so you decided to throw away the excess.

with_item.found: %1$sDigging through messages, you found %2$s, along with **$%3$d credits!** %4$s
with_item.found_but_overflow: %1$sDigging through messages, you found %2$s, along with **$%3$d credits.**%4$sBut you already had too many credits, so I donated the excess.

without_item.found_but_overflow_no_item: %1$sDigging through messages, you found **$%2$d credits.** But you already had too many credits, so I donated the excess.

loot.dust: Digging through messages, you found nothing but dust
loot.easter: Seems like you've got so much dust here... You might want to clean this up before it gets too messy!

mine.no_pick: %1$sYou don't have any pick to mine.
mine.not_suitable: %1$sThis is not a pick you can use to mine!
mine.not_in_inventory: %1$sYou don't have this pick on your inventory, switching to the default pick.
mine.success: %1$sYou mined minerals worth **$%2$s credits**, using a *%3$s*

diamond.overflow: Huh, you found a diamond while mining, but you already had too much, so I sold it for you.
diamond.success: Huh! You got lucky and found a diamond while mining, check your inventory!

gem.overflow: Huh, you found *%1$s* while mining, but you already had too much of that gem, so I sold it for you.
gem.success: Huh! You got lucky and found *%1$s* while mining, check your inventory.

mine.pick_broke: %1$sOne of your picks broke while mining.
mine.waifu_help: Your waifu came and joined your mining adventure and you both get a larger haul!

errors.amount_not_ticket: %1$sYou cannot specify how many tickets you're gonna use if you're not using tickets!
errors.too_much_money: %1$sThis machine cannot dispense that much money!
errors.not_enough_money: %1$sYou don't have enough money to play the slots machine!
errors.no_tickets: %1$sYou wanted to use tickets but you don't have any :<

slots.roll: %1$s**You used %2$s and rolled the slot machine**
slots.win: And you won **%1$d** credits and got to keep what you bet (%2$d credits)! Lucky!
slots.lose:
And you lost %1$s
I hope you do better next time!

inner.game:
%1sThis page shows the top 10 people who have won the most games.

Check out `~>help game` or `~>help trivia` for details on how games work!
inner.claim:
%1sThis page shows the top 10 people who have been waifu claimed the most.

Check out `~>help waifu` for details on the waifu system.
inner.money:
%1$sThis page shows the top 10 richest people on Mantaro.
This leaderboard has been stale for a while, but never give up!
inner.rep: %1sThis page shows the top 10 people with the most reputation.
inner.streak:
%1sThis page shows the top 10 people with the most daily streaks.

Check out `~>help daily` for more info
inner.lvl:
%1sThis page shows the top 10 people with the most level.

Level is earning through talking. Command usage doesn't contribute to experience, and XP has a 30 seconds cooldown.
inner.waifu:
%1sThis page shows the top 10 people with the most weighted waifu value.

Check out `~>help waifu` for details on the waifu system.
inner.gamble:
%1sThis page shows the top 10 people with the most gamble runs won.

Check out `~>help gamble` for details on gamble.
inner.slots:
%1sThis page shows the top 10 people with the most slots runs won.

Check out `~>help slots` for details on slots.

server_command_disallow.no_command: %1$sYou need to specify the command you want to disable on this server.

server_command_allow.no_command: %1$sYou need to specify the command you want to enable on this server.

server_command_specific_disallow.invalid: %1$sYou need to specify the channel name and the command to disallow.

server_command_specific_allow.invalid: %1$sYou need to specify the channel name and the command to allow.

server_channel_disallow.no_channel: %1$sYou need to specify the channel where you want the bot not to listen to commands.
server_channel_disallow.too_many: %1$sYou cannot disable more channels since the bot wouldn't be able to talk otherwise :(
server_channel_disallow.success: %1$sChannel %2$s will no longer listen to commands

server_channel_allow.no_channel: %1$sYou need to specify the channel where you want the bot to listen to commands. (All channels by default)

category_disable.no_category: %1$sYou need to specify a category to disable.
category_disable.moderation_notice: %1$sYou cannot disable moderation since it contains this command.

category_enable.no_category: %1$sYou need to specify a category to enable.

category_specific_disable.invalid: %1$sYou need to specify a category to disable and the channel where.
category_specific_disable.moderation_notice: %1$sYou cannot disable moderation since it contains this command.

category_specific_enable.invalid: %1$sYou need to specify a category to enable and the channel where.

server_role_specific_disallow.invalid: %1$sYou need the role and the command to disallow!
server_role_specific_disallow.already_disabled: %1$sThis command was already disabled for the specified role.

server_role_specific_allow.invalid: %1$sYou need the role and the command to allow!
server_role_specific_allow.not_disabled: %1$sThis command wasn't disabled for this role.

category_role_specific_disable.invalid: %1$sYou need to specify a category to disable and the role to.
category_role_specific_disable.moderation_notice: %1$sYou cannot disable moderation since it contains this command.

category_role_specific_enable.invalid: %1$sYou need to specify a role to enable and the channel where.

fairqueue_max.invalid: %1$sYou need to specify a positive integer.

music_channel.no_channel: %1$sYou need to specify what voice channel you want to bind the music player to.

music_queuelimit.no_args: %1$sYou need to specify what's the queue limit you want to use. *(Default: 350)*
music_queuelimit.success: %1$sThe queue limit on this server is now **%2$d** songs.
music_queuelimit.invalid: %1$sYou're trying to set too high of a number (which won't be applied anyway), silly

music_clearchannel.success: %1$sI can play music on all channels now

localblacklist_add.invalid: %1$s**You need to specify the users to locally blacklist.**
localblacklist_add.yourself_notice: %1$sWhy are you trying to blacklist yourself?...
localblacklist_add.admin_notice: %1$sOne (or more) of the users you're trying to blacklist are admins or Bot Commanders!

localblacklist_remove.invalid: %1$s**You need to specify the users to locally un-blacklist.**

logs_enable.no_channel: %1$sYou need to specify which channel to use as the log channel.
logs_enable.success: %1$sMessage logging has been enabled with parameters -> `Channel #%2$s (%3$s)`

logs_exclude.no_args: %1$sYou need to specify which channel to exclude, or `clearchannels` to clear all exceptions, or `remove` to remove a single channel from the exception list.

modlog_blacklist.no_mentions: %1$s**You need to specify the users to locally blacklist from mod logs.**

modlog_whitelist.no_mentions: %1$s**You need to specify the users to locally whitelist from mod logs.**

linkprotection_channel_allow.no_channel: %1$sYou need to specify what channel you want to exclude from the invite checker.
linkprotection_channel_allow.success: %1$s%2$s can now be used to send discord invites.

linkprotection_channel_disallow.no_channel: %1$sYou need to specify what channel you want to include on the invite checker. (All channels included by default)
linkprotection_channel_disallow.success: %1$s%2$s cannot longer be used to send discord invites.

linkprotection_user_allow.no_channel: %1$sYou need to specify what user you want to exclude from the invite checker.
linkprotection_user_allow.no_mentions: %1$sYou need to mention the user to whitelist from posting invites!

linkprotection_user_disallow.no_channel: %1$sYou need to specify what user you want to include on the invite checker. (Everyone but admins included by default)
linkprotection_user_disallow.no_mentions: %1$sYou need to mention the user to blacklist from posting invites!
linkprotection_user_disallow.not_whitelisted: %1$sThis user isn't in the invite posting whitelist!

imageboard_tags_blacklist_add.no_tag: %1$sYou need to specify at least a tag to blacklist!

imageboard_tags_blacklist_remove.no_tag: %1$sYou need to specify at least a tag to un-blacklist!

birthday_enable.no_args: %1$sYou need to specify the channel name and the role name.
birthday_enable.public_role: %1$sYou cannot set the everyone role as a birthday role! Remember that the birthday role is a role that gets assigned to the person when the birthday comes, and then removes when the day passes away.
birthday_enable.autorole: %1$sYou cannot set the autorole role as a birthday role! Remember that the birthday role is a role that gets assigned to the person when the birthday comes, and then removes when the day passes away.
birthday_enable.warning: %1$sRemember that the birthday role is a role that gets assigned to the person when the birthday comes, and then removes when the day passes away.If you have any doubts on how to configure it, you can always join our support guild and ask. You can also check `~>opts help birthday enable` for an example.
birthday_enable.warning_1: This is because of how the birthday assigner works: It assigns a temporary role to the person having its birthday, and un-assigns it when the birthday day has passed. **This means that everyone with the birthday role will get the role removed the day the birthday passes through**. Please take caution when choosing what role to use, as a misconfiguration might make bad things happen (really)!
birthday_enable.warning_2: The role *has to be a newly created role or a role you don't use for anyone else*. It MUST NOT be a role you already have on your users.
birthday_enable.warning_3: Type **yes** if you agree to set the role %1$s as a birthday role, and **no** to cancel. This timeouts in 45 seconds.
birthday_enable.success: %1$sBirthday logging enabled on this server with parameters -> Channel: `%2$s (%3$s)` and role: `%4$s (%5$s)`
birthday_enable.error_channel_1: %1$sI didn't find a channel or role!
birthday_enable.error_channel_2: **Remember, you don't have to mention neither the role or the channel, rather just type its name, order is <channel> <role>, without the leading "<>".**

birthday_disable.success: %1$sBirthday logging has been disabled on this server

prefix_set.no_prefix: %1$sYou need to tell me what prefix you want to use.
prefix_set.too_long: %1$sDon't you think that's a bit too long?
prefix_set.empty_prefix: %1$sCannot set the guild prefix to nothing...
prefix_set.success: %1$sYour server's custom prefix has been set to %2$s

prefix_clear.success: %1$sYour server's custom prefix has been disabled

autorole_set.no_role: %1$sYou didn't tell me what role to look for!
autorole_set.no_role_found: %1$sI couldn't find a role with that name. If the role has spaces, try wrapping it in quotes.
autorole_set.hierarchy_conflict: %1$sThis role is placed higher than your highest role, therefore you cannot put it as autorole!
autorole_set.self_hierarchy_conflict: %1$sThis role is placed higher than my highest role, therefore you cannot put it as autorole!
autorole_set.success: %1$sThe server autorole is now set to: **%2$s** (Position: %3$d)

autorole_unbind.success: %1$sThe autorole for this server has been removed.

usermessage_join_channel.no_channel: %1$sYou need to specify what channel you want me to send the join message.
usermessage_join_channel.success: %1$sThe user join log channel is now set to: %2$s

usermessage_leave_channel.no_channel: %1$sYou need to specify what channel you want me to send the leave message.
usermessage_leave_channel.success: %1$sThe user leave log channel is now set to: %2$s

usermessage_channel.no_channel: %1$sYou need to specify what channel you want me to send the join and leave messages.
usermessage_channel.success: %1$sThe logging Join/Leave channel is set to: %2$s

usermessage_joinmessage.no_message: %1$sYou need to specify what message you want me to say when someone joins!

usermessage_leavemessage.no_message: %1$sYou need to specify what message you want me to say when someone leaves!

autoroles_add.no_args: %1$sYou need to specify the name of the iam and the name of the role.
autoroles_add.no_role_found: %1$sI didn't find a role with that name!
autoroles_add.hierarchy_conflict: %1$sThis role is placed higher than your highest role, therefore you cannot put it as an auto-assignable role!
autoroles_add.self_hierarchy_conflict: %1$sThis role is placed higher than my highest role, therefore you cannot put it as an auto-assignable role!
autoroles_add.success: %1$sAdded auto-assignable role **%2$s**, which gives the role **%3$s**

autoroles_remove.no_args: %1$sYou need to specify the name of the iam you want to remove.
autoroles_remove.not_found: %1$sI couldn't find an auto-assignable role with that name

admincustom.no_args: %1$sYou need to specify if you want it to be true or false (true to lock CC creation to Admins/Bot Commander only)
admincustom.admin_only: Custom command creation is now admin only.
admincustom.everyone: Custom command creation can now be done by anyone.
admincustom.not_bool: %1$sSilly, that's not a boolean value (true or false)!

timedisplay_set.mode_not_specified: %1$sYou need to specify a mode (12h or 24h)

server_role_disallow.no_name: %1$sYou need to specify the name of the role!
server_role_disallow.public_role: %1$sYou cannot disable the everyone role from using commands!

server_role_allow.no_name: %1$sYou need to specify the name of the role you want to allow (has to be disallowed already for this to do anything, since allow is default)!

levelupmessages_message_set.no_message: %1$sYou need to specify the message you want to show on user level-up. *Tip: The username of the person is done using the $(user) argument on the message*

levelupmessages_channel_set.no_channel: %1$sYou need to specify a channel to show level-up messages!
levelupmessages_channel_set.success: %1$sThe level-up channel has been set to: %2$s

birthday_message_set.no_message: %1$sYou need to specify the message you want to show on birthday. *Tip: The username of the person is done using the $(user) argument on the message*

defaultmutetimeout_set.not_specified: %1$sYou have to specify a mute timeout in the format of 1m20s, for example.
defaultmutetimeout_set.wrong_format: %1$sWrong time format. You have to specify a mute timeout in the format of 1m20s, for example.
defaultmutetimeout_set.negative_notice: You cannot mute someone for negative time!

muterole_set.no_role: %1$sYou need to specify the role you want to use as the mute role. If the name has spaces try wrapping it in quotes.

birthday_test.no_user: %1$sYou need to specify an user to test the assigner with.
birthday_test.no_bd_channel: %1$sYou don't have any birthday channel set!
birthday_test.no_bd_role: %1$sYou don't have any role set for the birthday setter!
birthday_test.no_talk_permission: %1$sThe bot cannot speak on the birthday channel.
birthday_test.cannot_interact: %1$sThe bot is unable to interact with the birthday role.
birthday_test.success: %1$sDone! The message was sent on channel %2$s for user **%3$s**. They got assigned the role %4$s
birthday_test.error: %1$sOw... There was an error while sending the message on channel %2$s for user **%3$s** and role %4$s

usermessage_joinmessage_add.no_message: %1$sYou need to specify what extra message you want me to say when someone joins!
usermessage_joinmessage_add.success: %1$sAdded `%2$s` to the extra join messages successfully.

usermessage_joinmessage_remove.no_message: %1$sYou need to specify the index of the message you want to remove!
usermessage_joinmessage_remove.success: %1$sRemoved `%2$s (index %3$d)` from the extra join messages successfully.

usermessage_joinmessage_list.no_extras: %1$sThere isn't any extra join messages here...

usermessage_leavemessage_add.no_message: %1$sYou need to specify what extra message you want me to say when someone leaves!
usermessage_leavemessage_add.success: %1$sAdded `%2$s` to the extra leave messages successfully.

usermessage_leavemessage_remove.no_message: %1$sYou need to specify the index of the message you want to remove!
usermessage_leavemessage_remove.success: %1$sRemoved `%2$s (index %3$d)` from the extra leave messages successfully.

usermessage_leavemessage_list.no_extras: %1$sThere isn't any extra leave messages here...

options.invalid_category:
%1$sYou entered a invalid category. A list of valid categories to disable (case-insensitive) will be shown below```md
%2$s```
options.help_opts_notice: %1$sYou cannot disable the options or the help command.

discord_permissions.view_channel: Read Text Channels & See Voice Channels

description.headphones: That's what happens when you listen to too much music. Should be worth something, tho.
description.floppy: Might have some games. Don't copy the floppy.
description.racket: I won the game of ping-pong with Discord by a few milliseconds. Maybe.
description.forgotten: Never downloaded. Probably has been copyrighted.
description.pick: That guy liked Minecraft way too much. (`~>mine` tool)
description.milk: Maybe it's okay to have some.
description.beverage: Does really weird stuff in big quantities. Well, depends on what kind ;)
description.lewd: Too many lewd commands. Way too many. Had fun?
description.ring: Basically what makes your marriage official.
description.letter: A letter from your loved one.
description.key: Used to open loot boxes with `~>opencrate` or `~>useitem loot crate`.
description.diamond: Basically a better way of saving your money. It's shiny too. And let's you cast shiny stuff. How nice.
description.tuxedo: What you wear when you're going to get married with a girl, or going to a nice place, or maybe everywhere, who knows?
description.shoes: 'Cause walking barefoot is just nasty. Or painful.
description.rose: The embodiment of your love. Also it's a nice decoration.
description.die_2: Even more loaded. `Leftover from Currency version 1. No longer obtainable.`
description.booster: Used to give you some kind of boost, now it's broken. `Leftover from Currency version 1. No longer obtainable.`
description.berserk: Currency Berserker? Anyone? `Leftover from Currency version 1. No longer obtainable.`
description.Companion: Aw, such a cute dog. `Leftover from Currency version 1. No longer obtainable.`
description.special_ring: It's so special, it's not even a ring. `Leftover from Currency version 1. No longer obtainable.`
description.enchancer: A broken enchanter, I wonder if it could be fixed? `Leftover from Currency version 1. No longer obtainable.`
description.prize: Pretty much, huh? `Leftover from Currency version 1. No longer obtainable.`
description.crate: You can use this along with a loot key to open a loot crate! `~>opencrate`
description.prize_2: In the first place, how did you get so much money?
description.slot_ticket: Gives you extra chance in slots, also works as bulk storage.
description.bell: Christmas event 2017/2018 reward. Gives you a cozy christmas feeling on your tree.
description.tree: Christmas event 2017/2018 reward. Who doesn't like a christmas tree?.
description.pants: Basically what you wear on your legs... hopefully.
description.haste: Allows you to collect more stuff from lootable commands for 2 sessions.
description.energy: Gives less chance of a pick breaking while mining. Lasts only 5 mining sessions.
description.tropical_fish: A very tropical fish. Caught in fishing.
description.blowfish: I wonder... is this good? Caught in fishing.
description.comet_gem: Fragments of a comet you found while mining. Useful for casting.
description.star_gem: Fragments of a fallen star you found while mining.
description.cobweb: Something a spider left over on the mine. Wonder if it's worth something.
description.fragment: Fragment of an ancient gem. Useful for casting.
description.mop: A delightful way to clean all the dust you have around. I bet there's a lot of it.
description.claim_key: This item makes you un-claimeable (as a waifu) while having it on your inventory.
description.coffee: A delightful way to start your day.
description.waifu_pill: Gives you a significant advantage on mine and fish if one of your waifus is valued at over 2 million. Lasts 5 sessions.
description.bait: Gives you a higher chance of catching fish.
description.diamond_pick: A very much stronger pick (Diamond). (`~>mine` tool).
description.wrench: Casting tool. Useful to put stuff together.
description.comet_pick: A very much stronger pick (Comet). (`~>mine` tool).
description.star_pick: A very much stronger pick (Star). (`~>mine` tool).
